title: Test Case End
description: Event emitted when a test case is finished (meaning all of setup, call and teardown steps are finished).

event.description: The event type. Always set to 'case_end'.

session_id.description: The unique if of this test session used to aggregate events together.

node_id.description: The node ID of the test case.

start_timestamp.description: Start time of the test case (including setup).

stop_timestamp.description: Stop time of the test case (including teardown).

total_duration.description: Total duration of the test case in seconds (including setup and teardown).
